About:
___

The Ultimate Book of 50 years of Bond movies, Roger Moore celebrates the franchise's wonderful heritage. Superbly narrated by the author. 2012 marks the fiftieth anniversary of the longest continually running film series in movie history and to celebrate the most renowned 007, Roger Moore, KBE, has written a book that features all the Bond movies, along with a wonderfully witty account of his own involvement in them. From girls to the villains, from the cars to the cocktails, from the gadgets to the locations: this is the ultimate James Bond book, written by the ultimate James Bond. This recording is unabridged. Typically abridged audiobooks are not more than 60% of the author's work and as low as 30% with characters and plotlines removed.

Audio CD: 4 pages
Publisher: Whole Story Audio Books; Unabridged edition (October 4, 2012)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1471216640
ISBN-13: 978-1471216640
